Every time when I join a game after I accepted a match the game told me that I cannot join,so I have to go back to STEAM to check the game's files.It really makes me angry cause I usually don‚Äòt have enough time to do all of these before the game starts.So i'm here to beg all the staffs to find the BUG and repair it as soon as possible.It could not be my computer's problem cause my 2 computers both met the problem.I always cannot join another game in a short time because I could not join the last game.Pls quickly repair the BUG,or I'm afraid that I wouldn't come back to play this game on STEAM.As I know,the same problem also happened on other players' computer however there's no problem on their PC.Pls reply me soon after you fix it.THX.

I personally would rather keep those words to myself, not that I don't love you, I simply do not have the patience right now my mind is preoccupied by other things, needless to say the game is great and is free to play so well why not, worst thing that can happen is you run into me in a game and become somehow enlightened , maybe you meet new friends or maybe you don't you are probably an arse in that case.... hey I did not misspell arse, arse is a real word.... well stop picking your arse and play some arms race with me, don't forget to talk to strangers.
